body:
There is a link in the Packaging Guide documentation that points to a non-existent target. It shows up pretty clearly in the documentation:
http://software.llnl.gov/spack/packaging_guide.html#concretization-policies

The solution is to add the missing tag to the Concretization Preferences section of Configuration.

This bug was discovered in #1576 by adding documentation testing. It will be fixed in #1576. This issue is being opened to track the problem.
title: Documentation: Missing reference
